backend/main.mo: Main actor defining all backend types (Message, Worker, Material, CareerApplication, ArchitectProject, ContactRequest, UserProfile) and CRUD operations with admin authorization checks, including mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining OldActor and NewActor types with identical structure for state preservation during canister upgrades, with a pass-through run function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: material sale message broadcasting, admin dashboard message display, main dashboard activity feed, and admin summary cards with real-time counts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, i18n, storage, validation, UI components, and pages with details on functionality and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables for Work24 brand (off-white, orange, green) and admin dashboard (blue-gray tones).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining all routes (home, services, materials, career, architect, submissions, contact, admin) with onboarding check and I18nProvider wrapper.
frontend/src/components/activity/Activit: Activity feed component displaying the 10 most recent messages from getAllMessages query with loading and empty states, sorted by timestamp descending.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Layout component for the admin dashboard with a collapsible sidebar navigation (desktop/mobile) that switches between overview, messages, materials, and workers sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Renders admin messages with JSON parsing, categorizes structured fields (customer info, requirements, etc.), displays source badges, and provides a toggle to view raw message content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Displays four summary cards showing total counts for messages, workers, materials, and overall activity with color-coded icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/MaterialsT: Admin tab displaying a table of all materials with columns for ID, name, category, location, and description, plus a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessagesTa: Admin tab showing all messages in a table with delete functionality, confirmation dialog, and uses AdminMessageRenderer to display message content.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkersTab: Admin tab displaying a table of all workers with columns for ID, name, skill, category, and location, plus a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24Car: Reusable card wrapper component with hover effects (shadow, scale) and optional click handler.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24For: Form field wrapper component that displays a label, optional required indicator, helper text, and error messages.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactV: Dialog component for submitting contact requests with form validation for customer name, mobile number, and requirements. Handles submission via mutation hook and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/contact/Work24Of: Dialog component displaying Work24's official contact information (phone and email) with internationalization support. Shows contact details in a formatted panel with icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer component displaying contact information, service description, quick navigation links, copyright notice, and attribution to caffeine.ai. Organized in a three-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component with logo, desktop/mobile navigation menus, language switcher, and conditional admin link. Uses Sheet component for mobile menu drawer.
Layout wrapper component that combines AppHeader, main content area, and AppFooter in a flex column layout. Provides consistent page structure across the application.
frontend/src/components/materials/Materi: Card component displaying material details (image, name, category, location, description) with a contact button that opens ContactViaWork24Dialog. Includes hover effects and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Dropdown menu component for switching between English, Hindi, and Gujarati languages. Uses Globe icon and displays current language with i18n context integration.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card component displaying worker profile with image, name, skill, location, and work gallery. Opens ContactViaWork24Dialog for contact and a separate dialog to view work images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication. Handles anonymous and authenticated actors, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides login, logout, and status tracking functionality with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including admin messages, all messages, workers by category, materials, and operations to add/delete workers and materials with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides internationalization context with language switching (English, Hindi, Gujarati), translation function with nested key support and English fallback, and persists language preference to local storage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains translation dictionaries for English, Hindi, and Gujarati covering navigation, onboarding, services, forms, admin UI, and validation messages with nested key structure.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark mode theming including Work24 brand colors and separate admin dashboard color schemes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/adminAllowlist.ts: Deprecated module previously used for principal-based admin authorization; now replaced by username/password authentication via adminSession.ts.
Provides utilities for parsing JSON messages, categorizing recognized fields (name, mobile, requirement, etc.), formatting values for display, and extracting message source/origin with i18n support.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Manages admin authentication state in sessionStorage with functions to set, get, clear, and check admin login status using adminId and password credentials.
frontend/src/lib/contactSubmissions.ts: Exports a React Query mutation hook for submitting contact requests (worker, material, career, architect) as JSON messages to the backend actor with automatic admin message query invalidation.
frontend/src/lib/formatIcTime.ts: Converts Internet Computer nanosecond timestamps (bigint) to human-readable date strings with localized formatting.
frontend/src/lib/localPreferences.ts: Manages localStorage for user preferences including onboarding status, user name, language selection, and unique submitter ID generation.
frontend/src/lib/materialsStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-based functions to get and add materials with auto-generated IDs (appears to be legacy/unused given backend integration).
frontend/src/lib/officialContact.ts: Exports Work24's official contact phone number and email with formatted display strings and clickable links.
Defines allowed fields for worker and material data with sanitization functions to prevent exposure of sensitive contact information to frontend users.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the service catalog with six categories (furniture, painting, fabrication, plumbing, electrical, custom) including i18n keys and emoji icons.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation functions for required fields and Indian mobile numbers (10 digits starting with 6-9) with i18n error messages.
frontend/src/lib/workersStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-based functions to get, filter by service, and add workers with auto-generated IDs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page with login form and dashboard sections (overview, messages, materials, workers) protected by session-based authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Architect.tsx: Form page for architects to submit project details including name, type, location, budget, message, and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Career.tsx: Career application form collecting name, mobile, skills, experience, and optional message with validation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Static contact page displaying official phone and email information with service description.
frontend/src/pages/HomeServices.tsx: Landing page with hero section, activity feed, and grid of service categories linking to worker listings.
frontend/src/pages/Materials.tsx: Page displaying a grid of construction materials for sale fetched via useGetAllMaterials query.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: First-time user onboarding flow collecting name and language preference, storing to local preferences before redirecting home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerMaterialSubmiss: Form component for sellers to submit construction materials for sale, including name, category, description, location, and images with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Service detail page that displays available workers for a specific service category, fetched by serviceId from URL params.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerSubmission.tsx: Registration form for workers to submit their profile including name, skill, category, location, profile image, and work portfolio images with validation.
frontend/src/types/materials.ts: TypeScript interface defining the Material type with properties for id, name, category, description, images, location, and submitter information.
frontend/src/types/workers.ts: TypeScript interface defining the Worker type with properties for id, name, skill, service category, images, location, and submitter information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both hash-based and browser-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme colors (including admin theme), container settings, border radius, shadows, and animations for the application.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document identifying issues with real-time activity notifications not appearing in main and admin dashboards for material sales, worker registrations, and messages.
